channel.title: NPC drops
channel.description: ok i added a bunch of npcs and they show up great but... they don't drop anything. so i wanted to know what file i need and what i edit to get them to drop multiple items. i tried npcdrops.cfg but either i put the code in wrong or it doesnt work

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @blue12phat blue12phat
item.description:
@blue12phat wrote:

i could have worked it out, but thanks!

Read full topic

item.title: NPC drops
item.dc:creator: @Swiftymcfeat Swiftymcfeat
item.description:
@Swiftymcfeat wrote:

First go into item2.java and add a new droplist… you will see the others just copy one and rename it (unless your a complete retard)

Then go into npchandler.java and you will find a list of things basically saying if you kill a certain npc it will drop an item from the droplist you made it item2.java…

WORK IT OUt LIKE THE REST OF US DID

Read full topic

item.description:

u need to check ur item2.java or item3.java…
